channel.title: Enhancement Mode Gallium Nitride (eGaN) FET on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Enhancement Mode Gallium Nitride (eGaN) FET on SUPER-Lab

item.title: High-Frequency, High-Power Resonant Inverter With eGaN FET for Wireless Power Transfer
item.description: This letter presents a high-power resonant inverter using an enhancement mode gallium nitride (eGaN) device with magnetic resonant coupling (MRC) coils at 13.56 MHz for wireless power transfer (WPT). The power inverter driving the transmitting coils is based on a class Î¦2 inverter, a single-switch topology with low switch-voltage stress, and fast transient response.
